Initial commit: planned. - Multi-Tenant Planungstool

Next.js 15 App mit Supabase Backend für Ressourcenplanung:
- Clean Architecture \(Domain, Application, Infrastructure, Presentation\)
- Multi-Tenancy mit Row Level Security
- Supabase Auth Integration
- Allocation Management \(Create, Move, Delete\)
- User Management \(CRUD, Roles: admin, planer, gewerblich\)
- Asana & TimeTac Integration vorbereitet
- Realtime Subscriptions
- Keyboard Shortcuts & Undo/Redo System

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
